oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic farmers may gain from Green House Gas trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Svendsen, Gert Tinggaard
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Farmers may earn money from participating in the ongoing greenhouse gas (GHG) trade system under the Kyoto agreement.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Svendsen, Gert Tinggaard (2009) Organic farmers may gain from Green House Gas trade. ICROFS news, May 2009 (2), pp. 5-7.
